net.jawr.web.resource.bundle.factory
Class BundlesHandlerFactory

java.lang.Object
  net.jawr.web.resource.bundle.factory.BundlesHandlerFactory

public class BundlesHandlerFactory
extends java.lang.Object

Factory to create a ResourceBundlesHandler as per configuration options set by the user.

Author:
Jordi Hernández Sellés

setGlobalPostProcessorKeys

public void setGlobalPostProcessorKeys(java.lang.String globalPostProcessorKeys)
Set the keys to pass to the postprocessor factory upon processors creation. If none specified, the default version is used.

Parameters:
globalPostProcessorKeys - String Comma separated list of processor keys.

setUnitPostProcessorKeys

public void setUnitPostProcessorKeys(java.lang.String unitPostProcessorKeys)
Set the keys to pass to the postprocessor factory upon unitary processors creation. If none specified, the default version is used.

Parameters:
unitPostProcessorKeys - String Comma separated list of processor keys.

setUseSingleResourceFactory

public void setUseSingleResourceFactory(boolean useSingleResourceFactory)
Set wether resoures not specifically mapped to any bundle should be joined together in a single bundle, or served separately.

Parameters:
useSingleResourceFactory - boolean If true, bundles are joined together. In that case, the singleFileBundleName must be set as well.

setSingleFileBundleName

public void setSingleFileBundleName(java.lang.String singleFileBundleName)
Set the name for the joint orphans bundle. Must be set when useSingleResourceFactory is true.

Parameters:
singleFileBundleName -

setUseDirMapperFactory

public void setUseDirMapperFactory(boolean useDirMapperFactory)
If true, the mapper factory that creates bundles from all directories under baseDir will be used.

Parameters:
useDirMapperFactory -
